channel.title: My search for the perfect source
channel.description:
im looking for a source whit pk evry where (it doesnt have to be 100%) cw,silabs added and some other cool items. i dont whant the areas to be so big (it will only be me and some friends playing)a bank (duhh) and maby one small safezone. if anyone have any suggestions what source to download make a reply.
THANK YOU

item.title: My search for the perfect source
item.dc:creator: @lolplz lolplz
item.description:
@lolplz wrote:

Wow, I could re-word that perfectly and it would still mean the same thing! Here goes!

I need a perfect pking server. It's basically leeching, but who cares. It's only going to be my friends playing. Oh and if your cool add a bank, so when I post it on the serverstatus, people can play the server that I leeched!

Thats a perfect re-wording. If you knew how to code, you wouldn’t have asked this question, just went to downloads, downloaded pimpscape, and made your own zones!

Read full topic
